about_the_game:
Get the VIP look!

Future proof your fashion sense with this all new DLC pack for Kao The Kangaroo!

The VIP DLC pack contains three sci-fi themed costumes including - Space Knight, Robotic, and Future Punk. All three sets can be mixed and matched with previous cosmetics, adding a galaxy of options to your fashion choices!
detailed_description:
Get the VIP look!

Future proof your fashion sense with this all new DLC pack for Kao The Kangaroo!

The VIP DLC pack contains three sci-fi themed costumes including - Space Knight, Robotic, and Future Punk. All three sets can be mixed and matched with previous cosmetics, adding a galaxy of options to your fashion choices!

name: Kao the Kangaroo - VIP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Future proof your fashion sense with this all new DLC pack for Kao The Kangaroo!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
